backend/main.mo: Main canister logic handling user profiles, habits, records, investment goals, monthly targets, and authorization with AccessControl and migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old/new actor states and returning existing state unchanged for upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, related components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their responsibilities and behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color tokens defining light/dark theme variables and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app component handling authentication, profile setup flow, theme provider, error boundary, and dashboard rendering.
frontend/src/components/CollapsibleHabit: UI panel providing a collapsible wrapper around the HabitManager component for adding and managing habits.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component that captures render errors and displays a custom fallback.
frontend/src/components/FatalErrorFallba: Fallback UI shown on fatal errors with reload and retry options.
frontend/src/components/HabitGrid.tsx: Renders a grid of habits by day, allowing toggling completion and editing time/amount values with mutation calls. Builds a record map, manages editing state, and validates parsed duration or numeric inputs before saving.
frontend/src/components/HabitManager.tsx: Provides a UI to create, edit, update, and delete habits, including weekly targets, units, and default amounts. Validates inputs, parses durations, and triggers corresponding mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with user info, theme toggle, view mode switching, and logout. Also shows the report export dialog when in habits view.
frontend/src/components/InvestmentGoalCa: Shows an investment goal with progress, and supports editing, deleting, and logging contributions through dialogs. Uses mutation hooks to update backend goal data.
Lists investment goals and provides a form to create new ones. Validates input values and submits new goals via mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Simple login screen using Internet Identity with branding and a login button. Displays loading state during authentication.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyTargetsEd: Editor for setting monthly habit targets, loading habits and existing targets, with auto-plan defaults and save/update logic.
frontend/src/components/MonthTabs.tsx: Horizontal scrollable month selector using tab components, calling a callback when the selected month changes.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Simple profile setup form allowing a user to enter and save their name via mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProgressCharts.t: Generates monthly progress charts and volume stats for habits using Recharts with selectable habit views and lifetime totals.
frontend/src/components/ReportExportDial: Dialog for exporting habit data as CSV, supporting date range selection and optional habit filtering.
frontend/src/components/TrackerDashboard: Main dashboard combining habit management, monthly targets, charts, and investment view with month selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, invalidating queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading/storing identity, login/logout, and managing AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, habits, and related habit data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty type declaration file for jspdf.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Utilities for parsing free‑text time durations into seconds and formatting seconds into readable strings.
frontend/src/utils/fileDownload.ts: Generates export filenames based on date ranges.
frontend/src/utils/habitUnit.ts: Helpers to create, interpret, and label HabitUnit types and convert them for UI usage.
frontend/src/utils/reportCsv.ts: Builds CSV export content for habits and records and triggers CSV file download.
frontend/src/utils/reportDateRange.ts: Helpers for converting dates to UTC components and formatting them for reports.
frontend/src/utils/reportPdf.ts: Empty placeholder for PDF report utilities.
frontend/src/utils/reportStats.ts: Calculates report statistics including habit performance, daily stats, and volume metrics over a date range.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in session storage, and managing hash‑based routing params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color system, extended theme settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project state for habit-target features, listing requirements, known issues, and pending feature requests related to monthly targets and UI cleanup.
